document.full_text: two egyptian protesters were shot in cairo during christian and muslim demonstrations and an explosion occurred near the tomb of a prominent muslim sheikh in the sinai peninsula, state news agency mena said.
document.title: two egyptian protesters shot, blast near sinai tomb
lines_and_colors: two egyptian protesters were shot in cairo during christian and muslim demonstrations and an explosion occurred near the tomb of a prominent muslim sheikh in the sinai peninsula, state news agency mena said.
